title: Leading a Leap into Imagination
description:
Exploring our inspiring speakers at the KWDC24.
The timetable will be revealed next week.
subtitle: Stay tuned for updates!

speaker1.name: Jeff Gu Kang
speaker1.introduction:
Founded Monymony, which services Someone, and serves as CTO. 
Started iOS development when the iPhone was first released in Korea. Likes people with a mania for kindness.
speaker1.title: Save Someone: The Great Rating Boost Operation
speaker1.description: If there are multiple apps with the same purpose in the store, which one would you choose? Talks about how to stand out in the harsh app market with high ratings.
